title: "Gen. James McConville: Army Building Software Factory to Advance AI, Machine Learning Capabilities"
excerpt: "Army Chief of Staff Gen. James McConville told National Defense in an interview published Monday that the service has two initiatives going on to advance the development of artificial intelligence and machine learning and one of those is the establishment of its own software factory."
